meanings.definition: A condition in which the prostate gland is enlarged and causes difficulty with urination.
meanings.sent1: Prostatism can make it hard to pee.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa has prostatism, so he goes to the bathroom a lot.
meanings.sent3: The man with prostatism always has to plan his bathroom breaks.
meanings.sent4: His prostatism turned his trips to the restroom into a daily struggle.
meanings.sent5: The discomfort of prostatism is like a constant reminder of needing to pee.

meanings.definition: The symptoms associated with an enlarged prostate, such as frequent urination and weak urine flow.
meanings.sent1: Frequent urination is a common sign of prostatism.
meanings.sent2: He experienced prostatism with his constant need to pee.
meanings.sent3: The party guests joked that the punch bowl had prostatism because it was always empty.
meanings.sent4: The river's prostatism caused its flow to weaken during the dry season.
meanings.sent5: The prostatism of the faucet made it drip incessantly, echoing in the quiet house.
